text: Angel Has Fallen is a 2019 American action thriller movie directed by Ric Roman Waugh. It is about a US Secret Service agent being framed for a drone strike on the President of the United States by a group of mercenaries working for the Vice President. It is the third movie in the Fallen movie series, following Olympus Has Fallen (2013) and London Has Fallen (2016). The movie stars are Gerard Butler, Morgan Freeman, Jada Pinkett Smith, Lance Reddick, Tim Blake Nelson, Piper Perabo, Nick Nolte, and Danny Huston. The movie was released in the United States on August 23, 2019, by Lionsgate. It received mixed reviews from critics. It made $147.5 million worldwide. ==References== Category:2019 action movies Category:2019 thriller movies Category:2010s action thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:Movies set in Washington, D.C. Category:Movies set in Virginia Category:Drone movies Category:Lionsgate movies
title: Angel Has Fallen
